entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as making a rude hand gesture and speaking indifferently. He is also mentioned as not being out there bullying first-years.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as having his mind racing and thinking that Malfoy has more important things on his mind than bullying younger students. He is also mentioned as receiving a scroll addressed to him.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is described as possibly preferring the Inquisitorial Squad and being a prefect. Harry thinks he has more important things on his mind than bullying younger students.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione suggests that Malfoy preferred the Inquisitorial Squad and finds being a prefect tame after that.

entities.name: neville longbottom
entities.description: Neville is mentioned as receiving a scroll addressed to him. He takes it along with Harry.

entities.name: inquisitorial squad
entities.description: The Inquisitorial Squad is mentioned as something Malfoy might prefer over being a prefect.

relationships.description: Harry thinks that Malfoy has more important things on his mind than bullying younger students.
Hermione suggests that Malfoy preferred the Inquisitorial Squad over being a prefect.
